title: Hong Kong SAR
summary: Citi operates as a full-service bank in Hong Kong spanning consumer banking, commercial banking, corporate and investment banking, markets and securities services, private banking, transaction banking   and treasury management.  Hong Kong is also one of Citi’s key regional hubs.
tag-2: Citi opened its first office in Hong Kong in 1902 and serves more than one million clients today.
tag-3: Citi operates as a full-service bank in Hong Kong spanning consumer banking, commercial banking, corporate and investment banking, markets and securities services, private banking, transaction banking   and treasury management.  Hong Kong is also one of Citi’s key regional hubs.
